metadata.title: HomArt Glass Bulb Vase, Tall Clear, 1-Count
features: Each piece varies due to the old world pottery process
Perfect gift for your favorite green thumb
Uniquely shaped with a spherical base to house the roots of forced bulbs and a tall cylinder to aid in supporting the shoots and flowers to cultivate forced bulbs

Ideal for paperwhites and other bulbs for blooming indoors throughout the winter months. For bulbs larger than 3-inches diameter (such as many amaryllises), see our Extra Tall Bulb Vase (item# B0BMCX1ZHJ on Amazon)
Measures: 4-Inch by 11-Inch exterior. Interior is 3 3/8-inch which holds bulbs approximately 3 inches.
description: HomArt offers an exclusive collection of refined yet affordable home accessories created for everyday use. Our products are made from all-natural, recycled and new materials. Simple and tastefully designed, each piece mixes easily with any décor. Showcasing the handcrafted work of skilled artisans, the HomArt collection evokes the warmth and serenity of a less-hurried era. Our Homart Rustic Terra Cotta Tomato Pot, Large, in Antique Whitestone is from our enormously popular Terra Cotta Collection. This collection is versatile in its appeal and can compliment many interior styles from French Country to Tuscan. Each piece in the collection is hand made from natural materials of the earth using old world pottery techniques. Every piece is left outside to dry which results in an earthenware quality unlike any other. Join us in appreciating the variation that occurs through this process and enjoy the beauty of this natural distressing process. Offered in many shapes and sizes, it will be hard to resist collecting many sizes to make a statement on your window sill. Measures 4-Inch by 11-1/2-Inch.
